title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 364-4.4 - Application procedures for permit modifications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 364-4.4 - Application procedures for permit modifications

State Regulations

Applications for permit modifications must identify all
proposed changes to the permit including changes in vehicle license plate
numbers, additions or deletions of transport vehicles, changes in waste types, and identification of new or deleted receiving facilities. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
364-4.4

Adopted

New

York State Register September 20, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 38, eff. 11/4/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
